title: What’s in Your Hand?
verse_text: Then the Lord said to him, ‘What is that in your hand?’
insight: When Moses doubted his calling, God asked a simple question: “What’s in your hand?” Exodus 4:2 reminds us that God often uses what we already have.
God multiplies what you already carry. Don’t underestimate the everyday skills, tools, and relationships He has placed in your hands.
one_minute_win: Name one skill or resource you have and dedicate it to God today.
declaration: God can use what’s already in my hand.
